title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / ultraliberal dream quest
description: Savoir Faire hears wealth humming in the container -- whether it's raised or lowered. Also gives you instant access to MRLBG.

dialogueTree.title: Savoir Faire: "Here we are. Whoever is in there de..."
dialogueTree.text: Here we are. Whoever is in there definitely has money, so let's convince them to part with it for our *exclusive* piece of art.

dialogueTree.title: Savoir Faire: "There! In that container you moved...."
dialogueTree.text: There! In that container you moved. There's *something* rich in there. We've got to get inside.

links.title: You: "But I already tried to convince it..."
links.text: But I already tried to convince it to open for me and failed.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Then it's time to show you how a *m..."
links.text: Then it's time to show you how a *master* does it. No lock survives a round with Savvy. Get me up close.

links.title: You: "What do you suggest?"
links.text: What do you suggest?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Opening the door? C'mon, I shouldn'..."
links.text: Opening the door? C'mon, I shouldn't have to tell you that. Get me up close and I'll show you how it's done.

links.title: You: "Hear what?"
links.text: Hear what?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "The ominous hum of a preposterously..."
links.text: The ominous hum of a preposterously affluent individual... It seems to be coming from above us.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear dock water quietly lapping..."
links.text: You hear dock water quietly lapping against seaweed-slimed concrete, but definitely no ominous hums.

links.title: You: "(Look up.)"
links.text: (Look up.)

links.title: Savoir Faire: "See that massive container there, h..."
links.text: See that massive container there, held up by that humongous crane? That's it! We need to get that box of treasures down. Try using that control panel over there.

links.title: Logic: "Hold up a minute... why should a pr..."
links.text: Hold up a minute... why should a preposterously affluent individual be hiding themselves in a container?

links.title: You: "Let's slow down here. Why would we..."
links.text: Let's slow down here. Why would we search for rich people in containers?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "*Slow down*? We don't have time to..."
links.text: *Slow down*? We don't have time to slow down -- it's *crunch time*! Get your ass moving and control that crane! We've got sales to make.

links.title: You: "Yes, but..."
links.text: Yes, but...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "No 'buts', I want to see your *can-..."
links.text: No 'buts', I want to see your *can-do* attitude shine this time. Get moving!

links.title: You: "No problemo, boss-man. On my way to..."
links.text: No problemo, boss-man. On my way to lower that crane... [Leave.]

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Great *work* ethic, friend. No one..."
links.text: Great *work* ethic, friend. No one should be scared to get their hands dirty on the road to brilliant *success*.

links.title: You: "I don't see anyone. Are you sure?"
links.text: I don't see anyone. Are you sure?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Yes, I'm sure. *Someone* here has a..."
links.text: Yes, I'm sure. *Someone* here has assets stacked away in OFCs. Look up.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "OFCs or Offshore Financial Centres..."
links.text: OFCs or Offshore Financial Centres -- that's another word for tax havens. EPIS has adopted the OFFNET approach into their frameworks for addressing OFCs, but it's still a problem.

links.title: You: "Wait, you mean tax havens?"
links.text: Wait, you mean tax havens?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Tax havens, OFCs, Sinks, Conduits,..."
links.text: Tax havens, OFCs, Sinks, Conduits, *heavens*... Get with the terms, hustler-boy. Now look up!

links.title: You: "Wait, OFCs?"
links.text: Wait, OFCs?

links.title: You: "I don't hear anything."
links.text: I don't hear anything.

links.title: You: "You mean the rain?"
links.text: You mean the rain?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "No, not the rain -- the ominous hum..."
links.text: No, not the rain -- the ominous hum of a *preposterously affluent individual*... It seems to be coming from above us.

links.title: You: "Everything gets so quiet when it sn..."
links.text: Everything gets so quiet when it snows.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "No, not the snow -- the ominous hum..."
links.text: No, not the snow -- the ominous hum of a *preposterously affluent individual*... It seems to be coming from above us.
